/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches ahead, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors are vibrant and full of life, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
